text:
Stop, Sonia, enough! Don’t torture me!  

He begged her miserably, eyes pleading.  

---

Sonia jumped up, wringing her hands.  

What have you done to yourself?  

She fell to her knees, despairing.  

---

You are a strange girl, Sonia.  

You kiss me when I tell you…  

There’s no one as unhappy as you!  

---

Then you won’t leave me, Sonia?  

No, no, never! I will follow you!

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Sonia expresses her deep emotional connection to Raskolnikov, vowing to never leave him despite his turmoil.
